body:
wut es up, guise!

It's been a while since I decided to write stories or that sorta stuff! I thought about making the second season of that one silly story I wrote last time called 'The Last Man Standing' ( I never finished it! haha, got close to the end but meeeh xD ). Well, this time I'll be making it... kinda different. But I'll be keeping the same idea: a bunch of people sign up for the story and one by one they all are eliminated, until there's only one last man standing, and that's about it. Will be fun to write it!

Chapter Guide:
01: 

List of Signed Up Characters:
01: Eric
02: Flo
03: Evan
04: Michael 
05: Axel
06: Fatniss
07: Richard
08: Ella
09: Drew
10: Cookies
11: Merlin
12: Prisoner
13: Elsa
14: Badge
15: Strafes
16: Justin
17: Slicorn
18: Victor
19: Rev
20: Serra
21: Jessica
22: Anna
23: Zacharie
24: Chan
25: Tyler
26: Heat
27: Greg
28: Jonny
29: Cobalt
30: Chloe

replies.body:
Character's Name: Richard (Last name Dickinson)
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Appearance: A blond, not much tall guy. His eyes are blue :). With a 'believer' hairstyle and a cool appearance, always uses his white hoodie. He is a bit thin, but not skinny. He seems a little pallid.
Personality: A bit shy to unknown people, but when he knows well the person, he is very friendly and sociable. He is right and never do something 'illegal', but at the same time try to make his friends feel comfortable, because he thinks that he can get hated. He is very smart, and helpful, but believe too much in lies and trust too much on people that maybe aren't very good. He always try to be good, but when someone mess with someone very special for him, he comes very rude and make the person who messed with that someone special, wish never would've done it. He is very curious. 
Likes/Dislikes: He likes to swim and play tennis, but hates football (all the football's). He loves animals, each one of them, rats, spiders... every animal! He does like to go to much sites. He likes pizza, ice cream, vegetables, hot dogs... the food in general! He dislikes the dirty stuff, persons telling him what to do and profanity, but any way he sometimes uses it.

EDIT: Woah.... time to read it, no??
SECOND EDIT: It's not me to be honest... I will describe me if you want :P
THIRD EDIT: If you'd like me more, there is:
Character's Name: Ivan
Age: 11 :P (turning 12 in march)
Gender:  Male
Appearance: 1.55 CM, Cool shoes, with a white hoodie, a bit thin but not skinny, blond hair, with Playboy style, fatty fingers, light blue eyes, more than cool or good-looking he is cute.
Personality: Shy but social if you start the talk! Friendly... Trust on anyone! Smart for his age, likes to get recognized for what he does, rude if someone mess with someone special for him, curious, hungry, sporty guy.
Likes/Dislikes: likes food, swim, play tennis, and animals. Dislikes football, people who tells him what to do, and over everything: dirty food.

replies.body:
Character's Name: zacharie
Age: 17
Gender: male
Appearance: zacharie is short and skinny with short and fluffy dark brown hair. he has a freckled face and hes a bit pale (oh gray you know the horrors i went through just for that LOOL) he usually looks tired and unhappy, which most of the time keeps people from coming up to him for a conversation. also he wears dark colored hoodies and t-shirts most of the time :}
Personality: really quiet and has trouble with words and speaking first, but once he opens up to you he is actually really friendly and talkative! hes very sensitive and needs the support and care from his friends to not crumble. always wants to befriend someone but ends up being too afraid to speak first and just admires them from a distance :)
Likes/Dislikes: Likes - sleep, music, videogames
Dislikes - fire, confusion, being rushed

replies.body:
Character's Name: Chan
Age: 14
Gender: Male
Appearance: 5'10'', standard build, Asian (of course :P) Wheres dark clothing a lot, especially black hooded sweaters.
Personality: Solemn, the kind of guy who's always in the back, but he has that kind of atmosphere of some high power around him that makes others respect and fear him. His parents died in a plane crash when he was 3. He slit the throats of three thugs after they killed his brother when he was 7. For 7 years he hunted down drug lords and took out gangs in his home city. He carries around the wakizashi his grandpa gave to him after passing away 3 years ago. He feels little to no emotion when it comes to killing people, and he can move in utter silence.
Likes/Dislikes: Likes- war, martial arts, sword-fighting, silence, being alone.
Dislikes- cheaters, traitors, those who cannot keep promises.
